mpicxx  -g -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/01MPIQuickSort.dir/main.cpp.o  -o 01MPIQuickSort /usr/local/lib/libboost_regex.dylib /usr/local/lib/libboost_date_time.dylib /usr/local/lib/libboost_system.dylib /usr/local/lib/libboost_filesystem.dylib /usr/local/lib/libboost_thread.dylib /usr/local/lib/libboost_graph.dylib /usr/local/lib/libboost_program_options.dylib /usr/local/lib/libboost_chrono.dylib /usr/local/lib/libboost_atomic.dylib
